summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sturgus Avenue South, from a point 181.07 feet south of Atlantic Street to Massachusetts Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 114935 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
